name: Married filing jointly - Median income
description: Married couple earning $120,000 combined annually in Texas (no state tax)

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 IRS tax brackets (Rev. Proc. 2025-32) and FICA rates
sources.notes: Standard deduction: $32,200. Taxable income: $87,800. Tax: 10%*$24,800=$2,480 + 12%*$63,000=$7,560 = $10,040. SS: $120,000*6.2%=$7,440. Medicare: $120,000*1.45%=$1,740. No additional Medicare (under $250k for MFJ). Total deductions: $19,220. Net: $100,780.
